text: Mega Man Star Force 2, known in Japan as is an action role-playing video game made by Capcom for the Nintendo DS game console. There are two versions - Zerker × Saurian and Zerker × Ninja. It is the sequel to Mega Man Star Force, and will have a sequel in 2008. title: Mega Man Star Force 2
